IntroductionSection.body: colby enjoys exploring, and building upon, the endless potential of the world wide web

ContactSection.header: feel free to contact colby if you like!

AboutSection.header: this site itself is colby's most personal project

AboutMyWorkSection.header: colby has been programming most of his life

body.1: he started with writing BASIC on his vtech toy laptop as a kid.
body.2: growing up, he spent a lot of time in game editors extending his favorite games, then eventually moved on to coding in engines like unity and unreal
body.3: now he spends most of his time developing for the web, while occasionally participating in game jams.
body.4: colby has experience in a variety of languages and frameworks, but does most of his best work using React and NestJS to build full-stack applications. he is proficient with AWS and many of its services
